description:
From our office in Asheville, North Carolina, the attorneys at the Barbour, Searson, Jones, & Cash PLLC law firm provide unmatched counsel and support to a diverse range of clients throughout Western North Carolina who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Business disputes
  • Condemnation and eminent domain
  • Estate and inheritance disputes
  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Criminal defense
  • Mediation and arbitration

With more than 30 years of experience serving the residents and businesses of Western North Carolina, we have gained a reputation for our uncommon problem-solving abilities and exceptional client service. From our efforts, we have achieved remarkable success helping our clients obtain the favorable results they seek for their serious and pressing legal challenges, and we promise to do all we can to improve your likelihood for a successful outcome.

Honored for our professionalism and service, our attorneys have received consistent recognition from Best Lawyers, including the organization's Lawyer of the Year Award. Furthermore, we have earned many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers along with numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

This success is the direct result of the personalized attention we provide to all our clients coupled with our tireless work ethic and unwavering commitment to those we serve. We also work collaboratively as a team to leverage our respective strengths to give you the best chance of obtaining your goals and the positive results you expect and deserve.

To find out more, you can contact Barbour, Searson, Jones, & Cash PLLC to schedule a free initial consultation. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
